entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Rename constantly failing in MAUI Apps #65397
  • DocumentationCommentId parser throws IndexOutOfRangeException when parsing type parameter symbol in invalid ID #65396
  • Cover VisualStudioSettingsOptionPersister with tests #65394
  • [Compatibility issue] VB compiler generates tons of BC36954 errors when I upgrade .NET 6 projects to .NET 7 #65392
  • Provide separate `yield return` and `yield break` completions instead of a single `yield` #65390
  • Another Round of Milestone Cleanup #65389
  • incorrect ref escape check for expression body #65388

Closed

  • The equal symbols have a different hash code #65393
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Workspaces.Common depends on a very old version of System.Composition #45617
    Backlog
  • `Fix return type` introduces compiler error #65302
  • ExternalReferences.Lenght equals 0 on macOS #25222
    Backlog
  • A lot of allocations coming in from SourceNamespaceSymbol.DeclaringSyntaxReferences #33129
    Backlog
  • ArgumentNullException in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Diagnostics.AnalyzerExecutor.ExecuteBlockActionsCore #59988
    17.5 P1
  • CS1591 - False positive for interface-implementing member #65386
  • IDE0018 C# Variable declaration can be inlined shown when variable declaration cannot be inlined #50530
    Backlog
  • Constributer pain: Test discovery takes 20 minutes to finish #51208
    Backlog
  • C# Editor, Convert to Hex refactoring unexpected limitations #51821
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Correct `Nullable<T>.Equals()` calls in `BoundNode.Update()` #65398
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow multiline override #65395
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #65387
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • More tests for an issue around constrained calls #65385
    Area-Compilers
  • Pass in HostServices when creating the LSP server #65384
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Better infer tuple type for `Fix return type` codefix #65335
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Fix ArgumentNullException under a race condition in analyzer driver #65083
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, OnDeckForServicing, Next
  • Fix Package Dependencies For NuGet #65315
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #65400
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Implicitly-typed lambda parameters have RefKind.None #65350
    Area-Compilers
  • Improve `NormalizeWhitespace` for object initializers #65249
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix reading indent style and indent size from VS settings #65382
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForServicing
  • Fix SyntaxGenerator for checked operators #63411
    Area-IDE, Community, 17.5
  • Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding #64928
    Area-Compilers
  • Add "Make declaration partial" codefix #65018
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Complete all foreach binding checks despite LangVer check #65366
    Area-Compilers
  • Add additional cases whre 'use coalesce expression' can simplify code. #65371
    Area-IDE
  • Re-enable navigate-to streaming with IAsyncEnumerable. #65244
    Area-IDE
  • Add a separate option to control solution crawler's support of generators #65268
    Area-IDE
  • Fix bug in partial solutions after a document was removed and added #65349
    Area-IDE
